strapiPost.title: Newest NWA Food Truck Court Offers International Foods In Springdale
strapiPost.content:
Though boardwalks are usually by the sea, Arkansans can dream a little. 

  • On the sand: The Boardwalk Food Truck Court is a new, family-friendly food truck court in Springdale, located at 3445 S. Old Missouri Rd, where you can expect and enjoy delicious, international cuisine as well as yummy food from occasional pop-up vendors. 
  • Food for trying: Currently, at The Boardwalk, you can get Mexican food at El Trompo Loco, Honduran at Sabor Catacho, Salvadorian at Pupuseria Miriam’s, Venezuelan at Na’guara, Japanese at Jasper’s Hibachi Express & Sushi, more Asian at Asian Combo Wok, BBQ at Yankabilly Smokehouse, fruity desserts at Fruiteria, and Crepes from Crepes and Company. 

Learn more about the food trucks at The Boardwalk and their business hours HERE.
